extendedInfo.description: â Please email our support team before leaving negative feedback. We can't respond to feedback in Google Play, and we may be able to help you. Thanks! ââââââSee thousands of real success stories and race photos of your fellow runners using the C25KÂ® program at Facebook.com/c25kfreeâââââ"C25Kâ¢ will help you in meeting and exceeding your running or walking goals with itâs plethora of built in features." - Appyzilla.comâââââ"Here at Eat Apple News we love C25Kâ¢ because it helped many of us get back into shape. It will exceed your expectations while keeping you on track with your fitness goals."- EatAppleNews.comC25Kâ¢ is the easiest program to get beginners from couch potatoes to 5K distance runners in 8 weeks. This program will allow users to slowly build strength and stamina by alternating between walking and running, and only 3 days a week. After just 8 weeks, you will be fitter, stronger and healthier than you have ever been.Listen to your favorite music while you workout and follow the programâs convenient audio alerts. Along with voice/audio alerts and music controls on your headset, just press âstartâ, put your device in your pocket, and youâre ready to go. Alerts will tell you when to warm-up, walk, run, halfway point, cooldown, and when one minute is left to give it your all. By design, the program allows (and recommends) ample time in between workouts for muscles to heal and rest. So when users begin each workout, they are at their peak condition and ready to rock and roll.â Proven 8 week program to get you running 5kâ Easiest 5k program at only 3 times/weekâ Listen to your own favorite music and playlists while you trainâ Easy and intuitive interface. Nothing to learn!â Convenient audio coach and alertsâ Compatible with Nike+ GPSâ Integrated with Facebook and Twitter communities. Meet other runners!â The only C25K app that works accurately while your device is locked! The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â® Zen Labs has chosen to support The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â® in the fight against breast cancer. By using our apps to improve your health and quality of life, you are directly contributing to this cause. We will donate five percent of your purchases to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â®. Legal DisclaimerThis app and any information given by it or by Zen Labs LLC are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, would be five stars if out had GPS log included. Still excellent interface and always works. Integrated playlist is nice
reviews.author: Marty Jarnagin

reviews.title: I like
reviews.comment: It\'s very useful and easy to use also have on my iPod love very happy thnkz
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!!
reviews.comment: Im on week 5 and it feels great. This app has been amazing!! Great features and the display looks great!! Thanks
reviews.author: Angel Mccreight

reviews.title: Can\'t get any sound..
reviews.comment: No sound coming thru. Have voice and beeps on volume up on app and phone. Nothing. Motorola RAZR HD.
reviews.author: Libby Eaton

reviews.comment: Its a great workout plan I love it. I have more energy and I feel great when I\'m done.\tI recommend this app and I know you will love it
reviews.author: Latoya Walker

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app and cant wait to turn to the 10k app.....like everyone says...get a gps function on it...but im happy with it either way!
reviews.author: Chloe Marshall

reviews.comment: Simple and great.  I like that I can listen to my music at the same time.
reviews.author: Jennifer Bodiker

reviews.title: App crashes way too often
reviews.comment: I got this app and looked at it as a free version of couch to 5k. The app tends to crash in the middle of a run. Very frustrating.  I would rather pay for a working app... when working its a great app
reviews.author: keith S.

reviews.title: Cuts off
reviews.comment: In one week of runs (4 runs) it cut off in the middle of my run twice. Since it won\'t let you skip ahead or mark a workout as done this app is more trouble than it\'s worth.
reviews.author: Chuck Wade

reviews.comment: Great app, definitely recommend it - it could be improved by telling you how many calories you burned at the end of each session.\tAll in all,  love it.
reviews.author: BAM McCollum

reviews.title: Works as promised!
reviews.comment: No frills; easy to use and reliable. I like that it plays in the background so I can use radio or podcast streams in addition to adding playlists.
reviews.author: Jennie Brown

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This app offers a gradually increasing level of challenge. I always disliked running, but decided to start doing so to get healthier. This is the perfect coach!!
reviews.author: Delphine Fieberg

reviews.title: Fantastic app, great service
reviews.comment: App does a great job. Had a glitch in my phone and they emailed back right away. Great app to have!!
reviews.author: Erin Smith

reviews.title: Audio ads ruin it.
reviews.comment: This was a great, 5-star worthy app. Then audio advertising was added. It makes it hard to understand and blocks my music. The normal adverts were fine.
reviews.author: Erik A

reviews.title: Love it on my Samsung note2
reviews.comment: I just started running using this program to get ready forca 5k in September.   I am on week 4 and I am noticing improvement.   It\'s an easy program to folliw.  There have beeb a few tics here and there but nothing that would make me not use it.
reviews.author: Celeste Giles

reviews.title: Excellent 5k training!
reviews.comment: This program makes running a 5k possible for any couch potato! I never thought running would be a sport that I could do or enjoy, but I am doing it and enjoying it! I love that the app clearly lays out the jogging and walking times for you, and being able to listen to your playlist makes the workout more enjoyable. I also appreciate that some if the proceeds from the ads goes to breast cancer research.
reviews.author: Jami Whitwell

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: 5 stars for gps integration and louder voice.
reviews.author: Diana Fox

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love the app guys, but would really love a gps option so we could track our runs. I\'m running Runtastic at the same time, but would prefer to have it all in one.
reviews.author: Dave Levy

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy and allows me to listen to music while I follow apps directions. I love it!
reviews.author: CRYSTAL SMITH

reviews.comment: Easy and simple timed intervals to get the slowest person starting out jogging a steady 5k!!!
reviews.author: Moriah Wilkerson
